description: Flavor ID should be returned as a string in the OSAPI v1.1.
title: make flavor 'id' a string in the OSAPI v1.1

comments.content: Flavor ID should be returned as a string in the OSAPI v1.1.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince

comments.content:
Apparently flavors are really going to be uuids in the v1.1 OSAPI.

So now instead of just knowing that a 2 Gig instance is flavor ID 2 I get to do something like this:

  FLAVOR_ID=$(nova flavor-list | grep 2048 | cut -f 2 -d "|" | tr -d ' ')

Not really what I'd consider to be a step forward in usability. :(
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince

comments.content: Actually, just making it a string is fine. The spec doesn't require us to use uuids, just strings. I've got a branch in progress to do this.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
